nodes.text: Hunting blasters were the sportsman's version of the blaster rifle. They were very similar to the sporting blaster rifle.
A hunting blaster was a short-range weapon sometimes used for hunting small game.

The hunting blaster was used in sport shooting and hunting. It was also used as a personal defense blaster because of its accuracy, which is due to an extended barrel. It was common among the members of the Rebel Alliance, even Princess Leia wielded one in the early stages of the Galactic Civil War.
